cast.name: 雅罗斯拉夫·皮兹尔 Jaroslav Pízl

awards:
第53届鹿特丹国际电影节(2024)
　　短片金虎奖 最佳短片(提名)
introduction: A nuclear power plant worker obsessed with counting has set a maximum limit on how much electricity he wants to consume until the end of his life. In this grim but masterful 35mm film-poem with strong mathematical undercurrents, Marie-Magdalena Kochová presents to us a story of a man whose life is moving towards transformation. A loving acceptance of the fact that we are not just our bodies, but energy too.
